General.Name: Scicom MSC Bhd
General.Description: Scicom (MSC) Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the provision of customer contact center outsourcing services in Malaysia, the Philippines, China, Singapore, Hong Kong, Sri Lanka, Thailand, and internationally. It operates through Outsourcing Services and Education segments. The company offers business process outsourcing services, which include multi-lingual, multi-channel customer care, technical support help desk, consultative sale, and associated fulfilment; and electronic solutions and applications for online processing, border security services, digital platforms, and software solutions. It also provides educational and industrial training services that primarily focuses on customer care in the service industry, as well as sells education vouchers. In addition, the company offers customer support, education, gov-tech, digital experience, data analytics, e-commerce, application and system integration, social media support, back-end processing fulfillment, biometric, and big data and analytics solutions. It serves clients in the financial services, airlines, consumer electronics, media and broadcasting, travel and leisure, e-commerce, healthcare, government, and telecommunications sectors. The company was incorporated in 1997 and is based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
